name: AtariScene cardbattle EX plus ?
description:
AtariScene cardbattle EX plus ? is a card playing game. Two players having a pile of cards and each round is played with the card on top only. Each card comes with four attributes with values from 1 to 10. The player who won the last turn is choosing one attribute and the cards are compared by the number of this attribute. The player with the higher number wins the round and is getting both cards.

The game does have three difficulty levels: in "1337" you have to win all cards of the opponent, in "Hardcore" the game ends when a player has five cards left and in "Lamer" ten cards left are enough to end.

The game comes in presentation of a fighting game, with sampled speech and music starting only when the cards are played. As the cards are not cars or ships, but people from the Atari demo-scene. The four attributes are

  1. Productivity
  2. Idleness
  3. Oldschool Flavour
  4. Physical Presence


There are 36 different cards in the game.

shot.caption: The attributes of the computer are not visible until I selected which attribute to compare
On the "Stratagem" card I had a 10 (highest value for an attribute), but most likely misclicked and lost the round.
If the computer selects the attribute to compare, the cards are visible completely
If both cards have the same value in the chosen attribute... it's a draw (the player's keep their cards)
I want to read that more often
